project.name: Helios Datalake
project.scope: Unified ELT to Snowflake, dbt modeling, Kafka ingestion

sections.title: Intro & Role Context
sections.goal: Establish rapport, understand E's background and role in Helios Datalake
sample_questions: Can you walk me through your role and main responsibilities in the Helios Datalake project?
How long have you been working on this project and what phase did you join?
What does a typical day look like for you in the Scale phase?

sections.title: Workflow & Tooling
sections.goal: Explore ELT pipelines, dbt modeling, and orchestration practices
sample_questions: Could you describe the ELT workflow from Kafka ingestion to Snowflake?
Which parts of the dbt models are most critical for downstream consumers?
How do you use orchestration tools like Airflow to manage dependencies?

sections.title: Data Lineage & Quality
sections.goal: Understand how data lineage is tracked and quality ensured
sample_questions: How is data lineage maintained across ingestion and transformation steps?
Could you share how you apply policy POL-QA-014 in your testing strategy?
What’s your approach to handling schema evolution without breaking downstream processes?

sections.title: Cross-Team Collaboration
sections.goal: Investigate interactions with other departments and projects
sample_questions: How do you coordinate with the SRE team to meet SLA-HEL-01?
Have you integrated with any observability tooling from Nimbus Observability?
Can you recall a time when you had to collaborate with Security due to POL-SEC-001?

sections.title: Incident Response & Runbooks
sections.goal: Dive into operational readiness and incident handling
sample_questions: Could you walk me through RB-ING-042 and how it’s applied during failover?
What’s the most challenging ingestion incident you’ve handled?
How do you balance rapid resolution with evidence-based decision-making?

sections.title: Scaling Challenges & Tradeoffs
sections.goal: Discuss scaling strategies, tradeoffs, and future risks
sample_questions: What scaling bottlenecks are you currently facing in the pipeline?
Have you had to compromise on BLAST_RADIUS containment to achieve performance goals?
Looking ahead, what risks do you foresee and how would you mitigate them?

sections.title: Closing & Reflections
sections.goal: Summarize insights and capture final thoughts
sample_questions: If you could change one thing in the current data platform, what would it be?
What advice would you give to a new data engineer joining Helios Datalake?
Any final thoughts on how UX research could support data engineering work here?
